password.empty: password should be non-null and non-empty string.
password.tooShort: password must be at least 8 characters in length.
password.tooLong: password may contain at most 30 characters.
password.invalidCharacters: Your password may contain only letters, numbers and -_.{}[]()

token.notExistedOrExpired: The token is expired or not existed. Please apply a new one.
